kernfrasen: knit me together in my mother’s womb
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: GOD IS THE ULTIMATE PARENT / CHURCH IS FAMILY

kernfrasen: Shepherd and Guardian of our souls

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The Lord turned and looked at Peter... this bottomless look.

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer feels exposed and unable to hide.
theologische_implicaties: God's knowledge is total and precedes our self-awareness.
ethische_implicaties: Honesty and confession are the only logical responses to being seen.
onbedoelde_consequenties: God as a 'Big Brother' figure or surveillance entity.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'look' by contrasting it with the 'neurotic' looks of human parents.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon successfully bridges the Juridical (Justification) and Relational (Parental look) domains by using the 'Gaze' as the pivot point where judgment meets love.

gemengde_metaforen: Economic (Paid the price) and Relational (Strengthen brothers)
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The payment of price is the mechanism that enables the restoration of the family unit.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the dead metaphor of 'God's eye' and makes it a visceral, psychological experience of a parent's look.
sterktes.voorbeeld: The look of Jesus was not like our parents’ looks... no psychological undercurrents.

risicos.beschrijving: Heavy reliance on parental/fatherly imagery may alienate those with severe father-wounds despite the preacher's attempt to differentiate Jesus' look.
risicos.voorbeeld: Many of us will remember our parents’ looks.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Hearers may project their own trauma onto the 'Judge of the universe'.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Courtyard of the High Priest (The scene of denial)
sub_worlds: The Modern Family (Secrets and alcoholic relatives)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Excellent use of 'Family Secret' schema to explain why the Gospel includes Peter's failure.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By listing modern mundane sins (eavesdropping, hitting and run) alongside Peter's denial.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Contrasting the 'wrath of heaven' look with Jesus' 'pure and unmixed look of disappointed love'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits perfectly with Eastertide's theme of resurrection and restoration.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'Gaze' metaphor, which serves as a cognitive bridge between the shame of the human condition and the grace of the resurrection. It effectively uses the Relational domain to soften the potentially harsh entailments of the Juridical domain.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'wounds' of Jesus to the 'wounds' of Peter's reputation.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The scars on Jesus' hands are the receipts for Peter's debt.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The shift from 'Judge of the Universe' to 'Shepherd'
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly state that the Judge's verdict is the Shepherd's protection.

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Continue to ground justification in the personal 'look' of Jesus.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To build on the 'castle made of sand' comment.
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The stability of the Church built on a restored Peter.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful use of cognitive mapping that turns a historical denial into a contemporary experience of grace.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just admiring the 'look' as a literary device, CMT shows how the look functions as a cognitive 'unmasking' of the hearer's own schema of self-deception.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond the 'experience' of the story to the 'mapping' of the story onto the hearer's internal family/parental schemas.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the 'Family Secret' introduction isn't just an illustration, but a framing device that prepares the mind to accept the 'shameful' Gospel narrative as 'family history'.

appendices.notities: The preacher uses 'The Look' as a primary cognitive anchor for the entire sermon.
